title: Entitled: Life isn't easy when you're a book.
description: Entitled is the story of a Book seeking to find a home as it is passed from one Reader to another. Along the way, it reveals its own story, The Serendipity of Snow. â€‹As it is read, misplaced, loaned and abandoned, our Book, like the Readers of its pages, discovers love and heartbreak, loneliness and friendship, and ultimately becomes the author of its own journey. In the end, Entitled examines the pull between the story we are born with and the one we wish to create for ourselves.
author: Cookie Boyle
